title: Police name two women who died in crash on A46
description: Neeru Patel and Bhamini Karsan died with another woman whose name has not been released.
content:
Police have named two of the three women who died in a single-vehicle collision on the A46 in Leicestershire.
Emergency services were called shortly after 01:00 GMT on Saturday after a blue BMW 5 series left the road between Thrussington and Sileby.

title: Keir Starmer appoints career diplomat Christian Turner as US ambassador
description: Turner, appointed ambassador to UN in May, now replaces Peter Mandelson who was sacked over Epstein links
content:
Keir Starmer has appointed the career diplomat Christian Turner as the UK’s ambassador to Washington, replacing Peter Mandelson who was sacked over his links to Jeffrey Epstein.
Turner, who was appointed ambassador to the UN in May, had previously be... [2994 chars]

title: Multiple deaths reported after small aircraft crashes in North Carolina
description: Six people were aboard the Cessna C550 aircraft when it crashed at Statesville Regional Airport outside the city of Charlotte.
content:
Multiple people are reported to have died in a plane crash while the aircraft was landing at a regional airport in North Carolina, officials say.
Six people were aboard the Cessna C550 aircraft when it crashed at Statesville Regional Airport around 1... [387 chars]

title: Injured children to share nearly £20m
description: Children hurt in the 2017 attack will receive between £2,770 and £11.4m in damages, a judge rules.
content:
Children hurt in Manchester Arena bomb share £20m
2 hours ago
Lynette HorsburghNorth West
Nearly £20m is to be paid to children who were injured in the Manchester Arena bomb, a judge has ruled.
Payments from £2,770 to £11.4m were agreed at a Manchest... [3740 chars]

title: There’s no easy way to stop postpartum bleeding - but maternal choice is key
description: Letters: Prof Andrew Weeks, Anna Melamed and Sonia Richardson on the rising rate of postpartum haemorrhage, and the factors associated with it
content: Your report (Risk to women of severe bleeding after giving birth at five-year high in England, 13 December) rightly points out that the risk to women of severe bleeding after giving birth is at a five-year high. The article suggests that this is due ... [3667 chars]
